inDictSection.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription:
<key>NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription</key>
    <string>Photo Library permission is required to access photos and videos.</string>
inDictSection.NSCameraUsageDescription:
<key>NSCameraUsageDescription</key>

    <string>Microphone permission is required to record audio.</string>
